Package <Unnamed>

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Encryptor
    INTERFACE This interface is for any algorithm for encrypting The algorithm has to have a name, the Encryptor needs to be initialized, and methods for encrypting and decrypting must be implemneted for this interface
    Hasher
    INTERFACE This interface is for any hashing algorithm The algorithm must have a name, and a method to hash must be implemented for this interface There is a static method available for shifting characters, which is usually used in hashing
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Caesar
    This serves as both an Encryptor and Hasher A Caesar Shift is applied, given the key to do so It does ensure that all input and output are of valid characters
    Clear
    This serves as both an Encryptor and Hasher There is no changing of the input when encrypting or decrypting It does ensure that all input and output are of valid characters
    Datum
    This class emulated one datum Each Datum has its own Encryptor and the encrypted version of the data
    TestEncryptors
    This class is used to test that the Encryptors are operating as intended To add a new type of Encryptor, add a similar "add" statement at MARK
    TestHashers
    This class is used to test that the Hashers are operating as intended To add a new type of Hasher, add a similar "add" statement at MARK
    User
    This class emulates a user to the vault Users have a name, a hash of their password, and the type of hash used Each user also has an arraylist of data that the user has
    Vault
    This class is the main driver for Project 2 from IC211 (2018) This is the lab webpage.
    Vigenere
    This serves as both an Encryptor and Hasher The Vigenere Cipher algorithm is applied, given the key to do so It does ensure that all input and output are of valid characters
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BadCharException
    Custom exception class for Invalid Characters (not 42-122 inclusive on ASCII table)
    UnsupportedHashException
    Custom exception class for Unsupported Hash Algorithms
